com.wishcan.www.vocabulazy.storage.databaseObjects

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wishcan.www.vocabulazy.storage.databaseObjects.Book

  • public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
    Using this class to represent Book objects which are read from the database.\n Each Book object is consist of an id, a title and a set of content ids.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Allen Cheng Yu-Lun
